title: Microsoft to ship 60,000 Nvidia AI chips to the United Arab Emirates
description: Microsoft said on Monday that it will ship more than 60,000 of Nvidia's most advanced artificial intelligence (AI) chips to the United Arab Emirates as part of an agreement approved by the US Commerce Department.
content:
SAN JOSE: Microsoft said on Monday that it will ship more than 60,000 of Nvidia's most advanced artificial intelligence (AI) chips to the United Arab Emirates as part of an agreement approved by the US Commerce Department.

title: Revolutionizing D2C Marketing: Agentic AI Growth Platform Leads the Charge
description: Rainwater Labs is transforming the Direct to Consumer (D2C) marketing landscape with its new Agentic AI Growth Platform. The platform offers fast, transparent, and scalable marketing solutions by using artificial intelligence to automate and optimize campaigns, helping brands without large marketing teams efficiently target and attract consumers.

title: Cognizant to use Anthropic’s Claude AI for clients and internal teams
description: IT major Cognizant has announced that it is using Claude, the large language models (LLM) developed by American Artificial Intelligence (AI) start-up Anthropic for its enterprise customers and internal teams.
content:

title: Zoho Notebook introduces advanced AI features for students and businesses
description: Zoho has introduced a major update to its note-taking application, Zoho Notebook, adding advanced artificial intelligence (AI) features under its in-house AI platform, Zia.
content:

title: Harpenden group uses AI to spot weeds growing in farmers' fields
description: Rothamsted Research is using cameras on crop sprayers and artificial intelligence to detect black-grass.
content:
A research centre has been trialling using artificial intelligence (AI) to spot weeds in farmers' fields using cameras fitted to crop sprayers.
Rothamsted Research, based in Harpenden, Hertfordshire, said the cameras could detect the weed black-grass... [1841 chars]

title: OpenAI and Amazon sign $38 billion deal for AI computing power
description: OpenAI and Amazon have signed a $38 billion agreement enabling the ChatGPT creator to run its artificial intelligence systems on Amazon’s data centres in the US.
content:
OpenAI and Amazon have signed a $38 billion (€33bn) deal that enables the ChatGPT maker to run its artificial intelligence systems on Amazon's data centres in the US.

title: OpenAI Turns to Amazon in $38 Billion Cloud Services Deal After Restructuring
description: The agreement will give OpenAI access to hundreds of thousands of Nvidia graphics processors to train and run its artificial intelligence models
content:
OpenAI has signed a seven-year, $38 billion deal to buy cloud services from Amazon, in its first big push to power its AI ambitions after a restructuring last week that gave the ChatGPT maker greater operational and financial freedom.

title: Jeff Bezos' Fortune Jumps $10 Billion In A Day As OpenAI Deal Boosts Amazon Stock
description: Amazon founder and executive chairman Jeff Bezos saw his personal net worth grow by an estimated $10 billion in a single day after a major cloud computing deal between Amazon Web Services (AWS) and artificial intelligence powerhouse OpenAI sent Amazon’s stock (AMZN) climbing.
